## WACC with Debt and Equity Mix ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} set.seed(202) #| eval: true #| results: asis #| echo: false #| warning: false library(webexercises) re <- rnorm(1, mean = 0.12, sd = 0.01) rd <- rnorm(1, mean = 0.06, sd = 0.005) tc <- 0.34 we <- rnorm(1, mean = 0.65, sd = 0.05) wd <- 1 - we ``` ::: Aurora Technologies finances its operations with equity weight **63.3**% (cost of equity = **10.87**%) and debt weight **36.7**% (before-tax cost of debt = **5.78**%). The corporate tax rate is **34**%. ::: {.question-block}
✅ WACC = wₑ·rₑ + w_d·r_d(1−T_c) = **8.28**%.
:::
